item.title: Josep Borrell at his last FAC: it's been 4,000 days since Putin attacked Ukraine for the first time, he says. "Maybe our resp... (LiveUAMap)
item.description: Josep Borrell at his last FAC: it's been 4,000 days since Putin attacked Ukraine for the first time, he says. "Maybe our response should have been firmer, stronger since the beginning, since 2014. Now Russia is escalating: we have to avoid this happens with impunity."

item.title: Borrell: "We are concerned by reports of production and deliveries of complete weapon systems from these three countries(Nort... (LiveUAMap)
item.description: Borrell: "We are concerned by reports of production and deliveries of complete weapon systems from these three countries(North Korea, Iran and China), but in particular North Korea and Iran, the suppliers of directory military warfare."

item.title: Borrell: "The role of China is becoming bigger and bigger. China is today the largest provider of dual use goods and sensiti... (LiveUAMap)
item.description: Borrell: "The role of China is becoming bigger and bigger. China is today the largest provider of dual use goods and sensitive items that sustain Russia's military industrial base. Without North Korea without Iran, without China, Russia could not support this military effort"

item.title: "Putin doesn't look ready to negotiate but to escalate the war in order to fulfill his goals," Borrell says. "His goals have ... (LiveUAMap)
item.description: "Putin doesn't look ready to negotiate but to escalate the war in order to fulfill his goals," Borrell says. "His goals have been clear since the beginning: to conquer, to occupy and to subjugate Ukraine, a European country, a candidate country to the European Union."
